fields.value: Parameters for adsorption of (CWA) chemical warfare agents and CWA simulants

dsDescriptionValue.value: Dataset contains files with literature data (and links to original references) on adsorption parameters of CWA (chemical warfare agents) and CWA simulants, which are scarce and unsystematic but needed for modeling, research and development of adsorption based sensors and decontamination devices.

keywordVocabulary.value: INFORMAL INTERORGANIZATIONAL MILITARY GLOSSARY OF ABBREVIATIONS, TERMS AND DEFINITIONS RELATED TO CONFLICT PREVENTION (CP) AND DEFENCE AND RELATED SECURITY CAPACITY BUILDING (DCB)

publicationCitation.value: O. Jakšić, Z. Jakšić, D. Randjelović, I. Jokić, and M. Frantlović, “Adsorption-Desorption Processes in Defence Against Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear and Explosive Threats,” in Proc. 5th International Scientific Conference on Defensive Technologies OTEH 2012, 2012, pp. 701–706.

[1] O. Jakšić, Z. Jakšić, I. Jokić, D. Randjelović, and L. Kolar-Anić, “Multicomponent Monolayer Gas Adsorption: the Effect of Molecular Size and the Number of Binding Sites on Sorption Rates,” in Proc. 11th Internat. Conf. on Fundamental and Applied Aspects of Physical Chemistry, 2012, 2012, no. 1, pp. 669–671.

fields.value: Data suitable for modeling and development of adsorption based refractometric sensors or novel devices for decontamination
